control_attributes.Control: SA-17 DEVELOPER SECURITY ARCHITECTURE AND DESIGN
control_attributes.Control_Description: The organization requires the developer of the information system, system component, or information system service to structure security-relevant hardware, software, and firmware to facilitate testing.
